it_size.name: Should render the component as screen height size

it_size_small_screen.name: Should render the component as screen height size - on a smaller (shorter) screen

it_height_with_y.name: Should be able to render as screen height with a given y position

it_pushes_comps_beneath.name: pushes all components under it when it shrinks (keeps relationship)

it_5637.name: pulls all components under it when it grows (keeps relationship)

it_3c75.name: 50 vh should be smaller in smaller screens
